query: Could you organize a 5-day travel plan starting on March 16th and ending on March 20th, 2022, for a group of 8 people? We will be departing from Shreveport and we want to visit 2 cities in Texas. Our budget is set at $12,900. It's vital that the accommodations we stay at allow pets as we'll be bringing ours along. We prefer to stay in entire rooms and we will not be flying for our journey.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[San Antonio,Austin]
